vlive.korean: 우리 한번 가족사진 찍어 볼까요? - 오케이! Should we take a family picture? - Okay! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Should we take a family picture? - Okay!

vlive.korean: 이거 뭔가 사나 언니 가족사진 같지 않나요? Doesn't this look like a family photo of SANA's? 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: Doesn't this look like a family photo of SANA's?

vlive.korean: 어떻게 한 거야? - 야 가족사진 같다 되게! How did you do that? - Hey! This looks like a family picture. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: How did you do that? - Hey! This looks like a family picture.

vlive.korean: 잘 안 보이네 - 가족사진 같다~ 되게 좋긴 하다 이거~ You can't see that well. - It looks like a family picture. This is really nice. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: You can't see that well. - It looks like a family picture. This is really nice.

vlive.korean: 우리 가족 같아, 진짜! You are like my family. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [2년 전 오늘의 OH MY GIRL] 울 씅씅에게 빠지면 치료법? 그런게 어딨어요 이미 게임오버💕 (HAPPY SEUNGHEE DAY 2years ago!)
